wiki.content:
A song about the worries of a man who has discovered his girlfriend is pregnant. The main features of the song are; a strong, distinctive drum beat; mood-building gradual crescendos and contrasting distorted guitar solos
 
 The track has quietly become a favourite among fans of the band; it is too long to be released as a single or played on the radio, yet its infiltration and notoriety is tremendous.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: A song about the worries of a man who has discovered his girlfriend is pregnant. The main features of the song are; a strong, distinctive drum beat; mood-building gradual crescendos and contrasting distorted guitar solos  The track has quietly become a favourite among fans of the band; it is too long to be released as a single or played on the radio, yet its infiltration and notoriety is tremendous.

track.name: Knocked Up
comments: this song instantly takes me back to my freshman year of college, when this band was first really breaking through. now they suck. but this song still is cool.

their best tune by far!!
this song is haunting!
Road trip!!!
♥♫ ♥ ♫The original version♥♫ ♥ ♫
yeah!!!
this song is like a trip to space.....
the live soho version is wonderful
this song is perfection......oh give me some more
This song best defines Kings of Leon. Flawless.
I want to drive to this song late at night [10]
Uhh, I like this band ;)
Sounds like U2, in a bad way.
This is a spooky track...quite good.
such a good driving song!
